participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, with a passion for learning and sharing knowledge.
participant_1.background: I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. I have 2 turtles. I have a poster of Neil Tyson Degrasse on my wall. My favorite band is Radiohead. I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation.

participant_2.name: Jamie Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and nostalgic, with a love for books and storytelling.
participant_2.background: I feel like my heart is beating in time with the rain. I work at a bookstore. I remember listening to the radio with my father and singing along to the songs. I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies. I am dumpy.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for work?
I work at a bookstore!
Wow that sounds really cool! Do you like it?
I love it! I get to read all day.
Awesome! I wish I could get paid to read.
You could be an online tutor! You could work when you want, and you could read all day.
That's a great idea! I'll have to look into that.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I appreciate your help.
No problem! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really love the Harry Potter series.
Me too! I'm a huge Harry Potter fan.
Who's your favorite character?
I love Hermione Granger! She's so smart and brave.
She's my favorite too! She's such a good role model.
I agree! She's an inspiration to all of us.
I'm glad to hear you think so. She's a great character.
I'm glad we could share our love of Harry Potter.
Me too! It's always nice to meet a fellow fan.
Yeah, it is! Have a great day!
You too!
